TopicTitle: Suggestion: [VAB] change these camera mouse controls

Articles.Content:
unbind mouse [scroll wheel pressed] from (camera focus on part)
make it something else or make it 
[shift] + [scroll wheel pressed]

so you can pan the camera without unintentionally focusing on another part
The bindings are fine. It's just a bug that the "focus on part" treats already pressed scroll used for panning as a separate input for itself. Not sure if reported or not.
